conversations.body_text: Alright, we'll add it to your dual-mode shifter order.

Hey mate, How long is going to take for the shipment?

De: service@simsonn.com
Hi Thiago Rodrigues,    Apologies for the delay; the new shifter orders will be dispatched throughout this week.  Merry Christmas!

Thank you very much, if the shifter is as good as the pedals , everyone will enjoy your products more and more.

Please don't forget the white elastomer.

You guys are doing a great work.
Thanks for everything.

Merry Christmas.
Best regards
